ing: 5 fluid ounces vanilla-flavored vodka (such as StoliÂ®)
2 fluid ounces white creme de menthe
des: "Martini for the Christmas party-animal/enthusiast. Garnish with a candy cane."
ins: Fill a cocktail shake with ice. Pour vodka, creme de menthe, and peppermint schnapps over the ice. Cover cocktail shaker and shake; strain into a martini glass.
